text: @donwinslow @realDonaldTrump The sad truth is that we’ve banked our country’s future on two things that are not guaranteed: herd immunity and a vaccine. We’ve never been able to make a Coronavirus vaccine, and this one has no documented lasting immunity post infection. If we fail with both, we’ll be pariahs
